snippet: Supporters donated $25,000 in 24 hours, but George Zimmerman’s defense expenses continue to rise.
abstract: George Zimmerman is released from a Florida jail on a $1 million bond, five weeks after a judge revoked his original bail for having misled the court about his finances.
lead_paragraph: Supporters donated $25,000 in 24 hours, but George Zimmerman’s defense expenses continue to rise.

headline.seo: George Zimmerman Freed on $1 Million Bond in Trayvon Martin Shooting
headline.main: Defendant Is Released on $1 Million Bond in Trayvon Martin Shooting
headline.print_headline: Defendant Is Released on $1 Million Bond in Trayvon Martin Shooting
